DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether inclusion almond weight loss regimen augment rate weight loss , promote great fat mass/fat-free mass ratio weight loss , improve blood pressure ameliorate post-lunch dip cognitive function .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Including Almonds Weight Loss Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether inclusion almond weight loss regimen augment rate weight loss , promote great fat mass/fat-free mass ratio weight loss , improve blood pressure ameliorate post-lunch dip cognitive function .
DOC.criteria: Adult participant Overweight obese ( BMI 2540 kg/m2 ) Fasting blood glucose â‰¤6.9 mmol/L via capillary fingerstick blood sample No nut allergy Willing comply study protocol eat test meal Those meeting inclusion criterion .
